name: Simulatio-n
body:
### Welcome Simulatio-N
This is an N-body simulator using parallel programming for efficiency.

### Progress so far
Managed to create a working sequential code which works with great accuracy for upto 10 bodies.
Managed to create our own Libraries which would be used in Parallel implementation.
Generate a text file and a GNUPlot file for results.
### Future Goals
Implement Parallelization.
Create an interesting GUI for the Simulator.
### Authors and Contributors
Arkavo Hait(@Arkavo) 
Sagnik Bhattacharya(@sagnikb)
Aman Deep Singh(@aman150084)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
